description: Enhancing Access to Justice for the Consolidation of Peace in Nepal Project

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: Enhancement of justice sector service delivery is aimed to strategically addressing three critical areas: 1) Transitional Justice; 2) Gender Justice; 3) Access to Justice at the local level through establishing legal aid desks, community mediation centres and mobile legal aid clinics.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Pilot court models graduated a

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to prevent, reduce and mitigate the impact of conflict
